19 dds::AgentFactory* dds::AgentFactory::parse(int argc, char* argv[])
20  throw (parsing::ParsingException)
21 {
22  // Get 'agentFactoryClassName'
23  string agentFactoryClassName =
24  utils::parsing::getValue(argc, argv, "--agent_factory");
25 
26 
27  // Get 'agentFactory'
28  if (agentFactoryClassName == "EGreedyAgentFactory")
29  {
30  // Get 'minEps' and 'maxEps'
31  vector<string> tmp = parsing::getValues(argc, argv, "--epsilon", 2);
32  double minEps = atof(tmp[0].c_str());
33  double maxEps = atof(tmp[1].c_str());
34 
35  // Return
36  return new EGreedyAgentFactory(minEps, maxEps);
37  }
38 
39  if (agentFactoryClassName == "SoftMaxAgentFactory")
40  {
41  // Get 'minTau' and 'maxTau'
42  vector<string> tmp = parsing::getValues(argc, argv, "--tau", 2);
43  double minTau = atof(tmp[0].c_str());
44  double maxTau = atof(tmp[1].c_str());
45 
46  // Return
47  return new SoftMaxAgentFactory(minTau, maxTau);
48  }
49 
50  if (agentFactoryClassName == "VDBEEGreedyAgentFactory")
51  {
52  // Get 'minSigma' and 'maxSigma'
53  vector<string> tmp = parsing::getValues(argc, argv, "--sigma", 2);
54  double minSigma = atof(tmp[0].c_str());
55  double maxSigma = atof(tmp[1].c_str());
56 
57  // Get 'minDelta' and 'maxDelta'
58  tmp = parsing::getValues(argc, argv, "--delta", 2);
59  double minDelta = atof(tmp[0].c_str());
60  double maxDelta = atof(tmp[1].c_str());
61 
62  // Get 'minEps' and 'maxEps'
63  tmp = parsing::getValues(argc, argv, "--ini_epsilon", 2);
64  double minIniEps = atof(tmp[0].c_str());
65  double maxIniEps = atof(tmp[1].c_str());
66 
67  // Return
68  return new VDBEEGreedyAgentFactory(
69  minSigma, maxSigma, minDelta, maxDelta,
70  minIniEps, maxIniEps);
71  }
72 
73  throw parsing::ParsingException("--agent_factory");
74 }

80 void dds::AgentFactory::serialize(ostream& os) const
81 {
82  Serializable::serialize(os);
83 
84 
85  os << AgentFactory::toString() << "\n";
86  os << 0 << "\n";
87 }

90 void dds::AgentFactory::deserialize(istream& is) throw (SerializableException)
91 {
92  Serializable::deserialize(is);
93 
94  string tmp;
95 
96 
97  // Class name check
98  if (!getline(is, tmp)) { throwEOFMsg("class name"); }
99  string className = tmp;
100  if (className != AgentFactory::toString())
101  {
102  string msg = "Error with 'class name'.\n";
103  throw SerializableException(msg);
104  }
105 
106 
107  // Number of parameters
108  if (!getline(is, tmp)) { throwEOFMsg("number of parameters"); }
109  int n = atoi(tmp.c_str());
110 
111  int i = 0;
112 
113 
114  // Number of parameters check
115  if (n != i)
116  {
117  string msg = "Error with 'number of parameters'.\n";
118  throw SerializableException(msg);
119  }
120 }
